medical_history.chief_complaint: Localized abdominal pain in the right mid abdomen radiating to the back.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at 7 PM last night, initially diffuse before becoming localized. Patient experienced nausea without emesis and diarrhea, which has since resolved. The patient has no appetite.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Acid reflux, hyperlipidemia (HLD), osteoporosis, left ovary removal due to endometriosis, left knee tendon release.
